sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>This script removes unique constraint from Name column of sys_decision table.</description>
        <name>Remove unique constaint from Decision</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var tableName = 'sys_decision';
var columnName = 'name';

// set unique false
var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
gr.addQuery("element", columnName);
gr.addQuery("name", tableName);
gr.query();
gr.next();
gr.setValue("unique", false);
gr.setWorkflow(false);
gr.update();

// Remove index created on Name field in DB
var isUniqueIndex = true;
var columnsInIndex = [columnName];
var util = new GlideIndexUtils();
util.dropByExactElementSequence(tableName, isUniqueIndex, columnsInIndex);]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-04-27 23:14:09</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>b658167aa3830110e355f99246fcda17</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Remove unique constaint from Decision</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Decision Tables" source="com.glide.decision_table">d1f97c683cf1311068bcf327dfe37fb6</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_b658167aa3830110e355f99246fcda17</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-04-27 23:18:34</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
